prompt: Create a modern forgot password screen with a light theme and a clean, airy layout. The background should be a soft off-white (Colors.grey[50]). Center the content vertically and horizontally using a Column layout with crossAxisAlignment.stretch for full-width elements. At the top, display a bold 'Reset Your Password' title in deep blue (Colors.blue[900]), font size 30, with a medium font weight. Below, add a subtitle in smaller text (font size 16) in medium gray (Colors.grey[600]) saying 'Enter your email to receive a password reset link.' Use a TextField with a rounded border (borderRadius: 12.0), a subtle shadow (elevation 2), and a hint text 'Email Address' in light gray. Include a prefix icon (Icons.email) in blue (Colors.blue[700]). Add a full-width ElevatedButton with a deep blue background (Colors.blue[800]), white text saying 'Send Link', and rounded corners (borderRadius: 12.0). Below the button, place a TextButton with 'Return to Login' in blue (Colors.blue[700]). Use padding of 32.0 around the content and space elements with SizedBox(height: 20.0) for a balanced look.
